Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Scare_00>A monster this terrifying... Shouldn't
the hero be here?
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>If a pretty lady is in distress, the hero will
arrive to save her. Everyone says so!

So this is entirely expected!
Talk_0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Oh. Your pouch is practically bursting.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>Let me put this in a box so the Yiga Clan
doesn't take it.<sp:0:4:0>You can come back to claim it once
you've sorted out your belongings.
Failed00: <sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_01>My prince wouldn't have let this happen...
Failed01:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_01>Owww... That monster knew a good outfit
when it saw one...
Talk_0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>But, well...that's strange. The hero's
supposed to carry a legendary sword.<sp:0:4:0>And you, um, don't have a sword at all.
Talk_0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>But...that's strange. The hero is supposed
to carry a legendary sword.<sp:0:4:0>And that weapon on your back? It doesn't
look legendary at all. Not even when
I squint.
ComNakedCheck_W_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Oh, please! <sp:5:1:0>Don't waste your time talking
to me looking like that.<sp:0:4:0>Listen, your fashion sense—or lack of
fashion sense—is your own, but...<sp:0:4:0>I simply can NOT be guilty by association
of the fashion crimes you're committing
right now.
Talk_0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh, I'm just playing around. I know that
the hero isn't real.<sp:0:4:0>I mean, the REAL hero would be carrying
the legendary Master Sword, and...<sp:5:1:0>

That sword you have there...<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0b00>The M-M-M-Master Sword?!<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0701>Oh, you almost had me for a moment
there! That is an amazing sword, of
course, so it took me by surprise.
But there's no way you're running around
with something straight out of a story.
That'd be just too convenient!
Talk_0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Tee-hee! Careful, folks will <clr:0000>think you're
part of the Yiga Clan<clr:ffff> if you wear the
complete set!
But these tights are so nice, a little
coordination of any kind could really
snazz up your look.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>Thanks for coming to save me, really.


You might not be the hero, but you are
my prince!
SavedLv1_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Ease_01>Phew... Plenty of bruises...but no stains!
Thank goodness.
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:Angry_01>I was minding my own business when that
monster attacked! Imagine if I had fallen
and torn my clothes. Hmph.
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:SurpriseS_01>That could have been really bad!


I was worried for a moment that my
clothes would be COMPLETELY ruined.
Talk_0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I guess the hero is just a fairy tale.


<sp:3:0:2:0701>Me? I've been making outfits for the Yiga
Clan since they kidnapped me.

I mean, I like fashion, but I couldn't even
sew! Did they listen? No, of course not.

It wasn't so bad once I got used to it
though. Honestly, I've been getting a
little attached to the outfits I make.
Attached enough that I don't want to
hand them over to the Yiga Clan, anyway.

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>This isn't my size, but it might fit you.
Here!<sp:5:0:0> Take it so I can keep it out of their
grimy mitts.
SavedLv1_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Ah, I didn't even muss my clothes.
These are my favorites, you know!
SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:Angry_00>That monster jumped at me from out of
nowhere! My hat nearly came off and I'd
just gotten it perfect.
SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:Angry_00>That brute! <sp:5:1:0>I thought my outfit was
done for!
Atacked00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL_01>Somebody help! Won't somebody think
of my outfit?!
Thanks00:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>I'm so very grateful to you!


Take this, a gift to my prince.
Atacked01:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_01>Don't just stand there! My hat's going to
fall off!
